attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to to ban the breeding, ownership or importing of Staffordshire Bull Terrier type dogs or dogs of any similar type, to ban the breeding, ownership, showing at any dog show including kennel club shows or import of all dogs carrying the characteristics as being related to Staffordshire Bull
     terrier types and mixes of that breed, even if the characteristics are not pronounced.

     The breed type and cross breeds are purposely bred for killing other dogs and is
     responsible for maiming and killing large numbers of pet dogs,
     the breed is itself subject to more abuse than any other breed
     type and it is common for owners to prowl the parks and streets
    deliberately to set it on other dogs present.

     The breed type has no place in Britain, pet dog owners have the
     right to walk their dog absent of any threat from a breed type
     bred for killing other dogs.

rejection.details: The titile must be called to action not the 'short' name.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
